channel.title: Server Hosting Help!
channel.description:
I have already setup a server (volrom.no-ip.info), but when people who are not on my local network, can't logon. Can someone help me create a detictated server, or at least a server that runs while my pc is on, because i use a laptop and my desktop is crap. Any help?
-Volrom
